thread.title: GB, produzione industria -1,3% a dicembre, pesa chiusura oleodotto Mare del Nord | Macroeconomia

author: Reuters Editorial
title: GB, produzione industria -1,3% a dicembre, pesa chiusura oleodotto Mare del Nord | Macroeconomia
text: LONDON, Feb 9 (Reuters) - The Office for National Statistics released the following data on British industrial production and construction output on Friday. (percent changes) INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION DEC NOV (PREV NOV) F'CAST Mth-on-mth change -1.3 0.3 (0.4) -0.9 Yr-on-yr change 0.0 2.6 (2.5) 0.3 3-mth/3-mth change 0.5 1.2 (1.2) MANUFACTURING OUTPUT Mth-on-mth change 0.3 0.2 (0.4) 0.3 Yr-on-yr change 1.4 3.8 (3.5) 1.2 3-mth/3-mth change 1.3 1.5 (1.4) MINING AND QUARRYING INCLUDING OIL AND GAS EXTRACTION Month-on-month change -19.1 -2.0 (-1.4) Yr-on-yr change -14.3 5.1 (6.3) OIL AND GAS EXTRACTION Month-on-month change -24.2 -2.8 (-2.0) Yr-on-yr change -19.9 5.3 (6.6) ELECTRICITY, GAS, STEAM AND AIR CONDITIONING Month-on-month change 0.9 3.0 (3.2) Yr-on-yr change 0.8 -4.3 (-4.2) WATER SUPPLY, SEWERAGE AND WASTE MANAGEMENT Month-on-month change 0.6 -0.8 (-0.8) Yr-on-yr change 0.6 -0.2 (0.0)
